FuncDef:
The pnp-package enable command activates distributed patch files.
The undo pnp-package enable command inactivates distributed patch files.
By default, distributed patch files are not activated.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a board is installed, run the pnp-package enable command to activate the distributed patch file on the board.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
